text.div:
COVID19 ICD10CM Value Set for Liver Cirrhosis

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/sid/icd-10-cm
    Code Display
    K70.3 Alcoholic cirrhosis of liver
    K70.30 Alcoholic cirrhosis of liver without ascites
    K70.31 Alcoholic cirrhosis of liver with ascites
    K71.7 Toxic liver disease with fibrosis and cirrhosis of liver
    K74 Fibrosis and cirrhosis of liver
    K74.6 Other and unspecified cirrhosis of liver
    K74.60 Unspecified cirrhosis of liver
    K74.69 Other cirrhosis of liver

name: COVID19 ICD10CM Value Set for Liver Cirrhosis
